ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group Head of PEP & High Risk Analysis  Manchester, UK  2012 - Present  Leading the high-risk analysis team, overseeing the due diligence and risk assessment processes for high-risk clients, including PEPs. Ensuring compliance with AML regulations and developing strategies to mitigate financial crime risks. Key Achievements :   Led the overhaul of the bank's high-risk client assessment process, enhancing risk management capabilities.  Successfully reduced the bank's exposure to financial crime by 35% through rigorous risk assessments and mitigation strategies.  Developed and implemented a comprehensive training program for analysts, improving the team's overall performance.  Recognized with the 'Outstanding Compliance Leader' award for exceptional contributions to the bank's AML efforts.  Santander UK Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2006 - 2012  Managed the due diligence and risk assessment processes for high-risk clients, ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Collaborated with compliance, legal, and risk management teams to mitigate financial crime risks.  Key Responsibilities :   Conducted enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs.  Prepared detailed risk assessment reports for senior management and regulatory authorities.  Developed and implemented AML policies and procedures to ensure regulatory compliance.  Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts on AML compliance and risk assessment techniques.  Barclays Bank PEP & High Risk Analyst  Manchester, UK  2001 - 2006  Conducted due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. Supported the development and implementation of the bank's AML compliance framework.  Key Responsibilities :   Performed comprehensive due diligence on new and existing high-risk clients.  Monitored and analyzed client transactions to identify unusual patterns and potential risks.  Assisted in the development of risk assessment frameworks and AML policies.  Prepared compliance reports and presentations for senior management and regulatory authorities.  HSBC Bank AML Compliance Officer  Manchester, UK  1998 - 2001  Gained extensive experience in AML compliance, supporting the compliance team in conducting due diligence and risk assessments on clients. Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures.  Key Contributions :   Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying potential AML risks.  Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports and risk assessments.  Collaborated with other departments to ensure effective risk management and compliance.  Participated in training programs to stay updated on regulatory changes and industry best practices.

JobProfile.Title: Head of PEP & High Risk Analysis
JobProfile.Alias: mgr, management manager, head, management professional, mngr, private manager, in charge of management, team manager, team mgr

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Leading the high-risk analysis team, overseeing the due diligence and risk assessment processes for high-risk clients, including PEPs. Ensuring compliance with AML regulations and developing strategies to mitigate financial crime risks. 
 
 Key Achievements : 
 Led the overhaul of the bank's high-risk client assessment process, enhancing risk management capabilities. 
 Successfully reduced the bank's exposure to financial crime by 35% through rigorous risk assessments and mitigation strategies. 
 Developed and implemented a comprehensive training program for analysts, improving the team's overall performance. 
 Recognized with the 'Outstanding Compliance Leader' award for exceptional contributions to the bank's AML efforts.

JobProfile.Title: Senior PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Managed the due diligence and risk assessment processes for high-risk clients, ensuring compliance with AML regulations. Collaborated with compliance, legal, and risk management teams to mitigate financial crime risks. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Conducted enhanced due diligence on high-risk clients, including PEPs. 
 Prepared detailed risk assessment reports for senior management and regulatory authorities. 
 Developed and implemented AML policies and procedures to ensure regulatory compliance. 
 Provided training and mentorship to junior analysts on AML compliance and risk assessment techniques.

JobProfile.Title: PEP & High Risk Analyst
JobProfile.Alias: risk score analyst, analyst - risk, risk analyser, analyst risk, rco risk control analyst, risk advisory analyst, riskcontrol analyst, risk -analyst, analyst of risk, analyst - risk management, risk concurrence analyst, risk services specialist, risk control analyst, risk-analyst, risk strategy analyst, business risk analyst, risk management analyst, risk management -analyst, risk monitoring analyst, risk and controls analyst, analyst - risk assurance, analyst - risk advisory

SegregatedExperience.JobDescription:
Conducted due diligence and risk assessments on high-risk clients, ensuring compliance with AML regulations and internal policies. Supported the development and implementation of the bank's AML compliance framework. 
 Key Responsibilities : 
 Performed comprehensive due diligence on new and existing high-risk clients. 
 Monitored and analyzed client transactions to identify unusual patterns and potential risks. 
 Assisted in the development of risk assessment frameworks and AML policies. 
 Prepared compliance reports and presentations for senior management and regulatory authorities.

Gained extensive experience in AML compliance, supporting the compliance team in conducting due diligence and risk assessments on clients. Assisted in the development and implementation of AML policies and procedures. 
 Key Contributions : 
 Conducted due diligence on new and existing clients, identifying potential AML risks. 
 Assisted in the preparation of compliance reports and risk assessments. 
 Collaborated with other departments to ensure effective risk management and compliance. 
 Participated in training programs to stay updated on regulatory changes and industry best practices.

ResumeParserData.JobProfile: Head of PEP & High Risk Analysis
ResumeParserData.Summary: Highly experienced PEP & High Risk Analyst with over 22 years in the banking industry. Expertise in conducting enhanced due diligence, managing high-risk client portfolios, and ensuring compliance with global AML regulations. Renowned for strong analytical skills, attention to detail, and a deep understanding of financial crime risks and regulatory requirements.
ResumeParserData.ExecutiveSummary: Michael has an experience in the domain of 'Finance and Insurance', particularly in the sub-domain of 'Financial Analysts and Advisors. The candidate has been working as a Head of PEP & High Risk Analysis at NatWest Group for the last 12.7 years.
ResumeParserData.ManagementSummary: Currently, Michael holds a High Management Level position, as Head of PEP & High Risk Analysis at NatWest Group. from 01/01/2012 to 05/07/2024. The candidate has a total experience of 12.7 years in this company.
